item.title: Car obstructing the pavement, 19th August
item.description:

item.title: Disruptive Late Night Loitering and Loud Noise, 19th August
item.description:
Since moving to Walford Road over 1 year ago there are consistently large groups loitering late at night due to The Best Ever Turkish Kebab being one of the only food stalls open in the area until 2AM on weekdays and 3AM on weekends.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Walford Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish, 19th August
item.description:

item.title: Oak tree in the grounds of Danson Primary School, 19th August
item.description:
The tree hangs completely over my garden . Itâ€™s huge and has never been pruned back. All the debris falls in my garden and leaves acorns which are toxic for my dogs. I wish for the tree to be pruned right back like some have been done further down in the playground please

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Danson Lane, Welling, London

item.title: Overgrown leaning tree (to Walden Road/ 46 Sandy Ridge) damaging pavement and private hard standing, 19th August
item.description:
The tree is overgrowing the boundary with my property, leaning towards my property, the tree roots are damaging the pavement and also damaging concrete hardstandings within the boundary of my property. The issue appears to have been ongoing for some time as the council have already locally replaced a section of paving slabs with tarmacadam where the tree roots have damaged the pavement. Please can the situation be addressed to prevent further damage to my property.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Walden Road, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Opposite1-8 Addison court, 19th August
item.description:
This new bin is obstructing the already very tight pavement from the construction work that has taken over the pavement. It is now impossible for anyone with a stroller, a wheelchair or even a suitcase to safely walk the pavement. Please move As soon as possible.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Kilburn High Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree overhanging property, 19th August
item.description:
This tree is in bad need of pruning. The branches are hanging so low they almost touch parked cars. Also branches are overhanging my driveway and garden. A high sided van could not deliver to my property because of the branches. You are already attending to a tree opposite on Thursday so I hope you can also do this one. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Whitmore Road, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
